items.title: The First 100 Days
items.description: President Trump instantly halted the leftward lurch of the federal government but has emphasized speed over care.

items.title: When Did the American Housing Affordability Crisis Begin?
items.description: The housing affordability crisis has not been slowly developing over the past 75 years, but rather quickly became a burden at the turn of the millenni...

items.title: State Department ‘Reform’ Plans Leave Much to Be Desired
items.description: Though Rubio’s more thoughtful reorganization beats Trump’s wrecking ball.

items.title: What’s Next for Abrego Garcia and the Venezuelan Deportees?
items.description: The Venezuelans should have less trouble than Abrego Garcia in convincing a court to direct the government to facilitate their return to the U.S.

items.title: Religious Charter Schools Should Pass the Supreme Court Test
items.description: A case from Oklahoma will determine whether American education becomes more or less centralized, homogeneous, and anticompetitive.
